queries.query: small fey creature that lives near lakes and has amphibious abilities
queries.variant: small fey creature that resides by lakes and can breathe both air and water

queries.variant: trickster creature with a bowl on its head for water and grappling talent

queries.variant: agile creature that is good in physical contests and has issues when lacking water

queries.variant: chaotic fey recognized for its cleverness and physical power in melee

queries.variant: tiny creature with impressive strength and skills to break free from grapples
